content:
Set-AzureRmWebAppSlotConfigName

Set Web App Slot Config names

Syntax

Set-AzureRmWebAppSlotConfigName [-ResourceGroupName] <String> [-Name] <String> [[-AppSettingNames] <String[]>]
 [[-ConnectionStringNames] <String[]>] [-RemoveAllAppSettingNames] [-RemoveAllConnectionStringNames]
 [<CommonParameters>]
Set-AzureRmWebAppSlotConfigName [-WebApp] <Site> [[-AppSettingNames] <String[]>]
 [[-ConnectionStringNames] <String[]>] [-RemoveAllAppSettingNames] [-RemoveAllConnectionStringNames]
 [<CommonParameters>]

Description

The Set-AzureRmWebAppSlotConfigName cmdlet marks App Settings and Connection Strings as slot settings

Examples

1:

PS C:\> Set-AzureRmWebAppSlotConfigName -ResourceGroupName "Default-Web-WestUS" -Name "ContosoWebApp" -Slot "Slot001" -RemoveAllAppSettingNames -RemoveAllConnectionStringNames

This command removes all app settings and connection strings for Web App ContosoWebApp associated with the resource group Default-Web-WestUS

Parameters

-AppSettingNames

App Settings Names String Array

Type:String[]
Required:False
Position:2
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-ConnectionStringNames

Connection String Names String Array

Type:String[]
Required:False
Position:3
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-RemoveAllAppSettingNames

Remove All App Setting Names Option

Type:SwitchParameter
Required:False
Position:4
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-RemoveAllConnectionStringNames

Remove All Connection String Names Option

Type:SwitchParameter
Required:False
Position:5
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-ResourceGroupName

Resource Group Name

Type:String
Required:True
Position:0
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Name

WebApp Name

Type:String
Required:True
Position:1
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByPropertyName)
Accept wildcard characters:False
-WebApp

WebApp Object

Type:Site
Required:True
Position:0
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByValue)
Accept wildcard characters:False
